headline: 'His act is wearing thin': North Carolina Republicans gripe about Madison Cawthorn
author: David M. Drucker
sentences: But what appears to rankle so many North Carolina Republicans the most, what is causing his act to wear thin,? party operatives in the state say, are two problems in particular: Cawthorn's initial move to switch districts, later reversed, and his attempt to decide the political fate of the rest of the state's GOP delegation by fancying himself kingmaker in the 11 House seats drawn to elect Republicans in an earlier version of redistricting.
